flavor: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

foreign_names.flavor: Der Schatten der Kerze ragt weit über alles hinaus, selbst wenn das Licht schwach wird.
foreign_names.name: Schatten des Todes
foreign_names.text: Der Schatten des Todes erhält -X/-X, wobei X dein Lebenspunktestand ist.

foreign_names.flavor: La sombra de la vela se hace más larga mientras su luz se hace más tenue.
foreign_names.name: Sombra de la muerte
foreign_names.text: La Sombra de la muerte obtiene -X/-X, donde X es tu total de vidas.

foreign_names.flavor: L'ombre créée par la bougie s'allonge même quand sa lueur diminue.
foreign_names.name: Ombre de la mort
foreign_names.text: L'Ombre de la mort gagne -X/-X, X étant votre total de points de vie.

foreign_names.flavor: L'ombra di una candela resta alta anche quando la sua luce si affievolisce.
foreign_names.name: Ombra di Morte
foreign_names.text: L'Ombra di Morte prende -X/-X, dove X è pari ai tuoi punti vita.

foreign_names.flavor: その蝋燭の作る影は、その灯りが乏しくなる程高く伸びる。
foreign_names.name: 死の影
foreign_names.text: 死の影は－Ｘ/－Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはあなたのライフの総量に等しい。

foreign_names.flavor: A sombra da vela amplifica-se mesmo quando sua luz se reduz.
foreign_names.name: Sombra da Morte
foreign_names.text: Sombra da Morte recebe -X/-X, sendo X igual ao seu total de pontos de vida.

foreign_names.flavor: Свеча отбрасывает длинную тень, даже когда ее свет угасает.
foreign_names.name: Тень Смерти
foreign_names.text: Тень Смерти получает -X/-X, где X — количество ваших жизней.

foreign_names.flavor: 蜡烛火光渐弱，而其阴影愈显高大。
foreign_names.name: 死亡阴影
foreign_names.text: 死亡阴影得-X/-X，X为你的总生命。

name: Death's Shadow
original_text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

rulings.text: Death’s Shadow’s ability applies only while Death’s Shadow is on the battlefield. In all other zones, its power and toughness are 13.
The value of X changes as you gain and lose life. It’s not locked in as Death’s Shadow enters the battlefield.
If your life total is 13 or greater and nothing else is boosting the toughness of Death’s Shadow, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, your life total is your team’s life total.
If your life total is negative, X is considered to be 0. (This is a change from previous rulings.)

text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
